fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Pick a player and choose one of two abilities: learn the next card they play, or if they’ve played an attacking card this phase.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Pick a player and choose one of two abilities: learn the next 3 cards they play, or a random attack they’ve played this phase. 

*Does not detect Silent cards. Some abilities and Reforge! may make it seem like someone else played a card.*
